example.eg: Hannah thought Josh's profile was more interesting than the full view of his face.
example.egtrans: 汉娜觉得，乔什的侧脸比正脸全貌更好看。

example.eg: The police have drawn up a profile of the killer with the help of a psychologist. The author's profile says that she has three children and lives in the countryside.
example.egtrans: 在一位心理学家的帮助下，警方得出了凶手的心理侧写。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 心理侧写, 传略, 人物简介

example.eg: The police are profiling the killer.
example.egtrans: 警方正在对凶手进行侧写。

example.eg: The book profiles several stars of Hollywood's golden age.
example.egtrans: 这本书描述了好莱坞黄金时代的几位明星。

dsense.name: profile [sth]⇒
dsense.guideword: (give information about: a country) (用数据图表等来)

example.eg: Researchers have profiled population trends in this country over the last two hundred years.
example.egtrans: 研究人员用图表概略描述了这个国家过去两百年来的人口趋势。

example.eg: This diagram shows a profile of the machine.
Agatha looked up at the building's profile.
This population profile is very well researched.
He's able to maintain his high profile thanks to a lot of TV work.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 引人注目, 受公众关注

example.eg: This lawyer has defended a string of high-profile clients.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 知名度高的，备受瞩目的

example.eg: After the argument I kept a low profile for a few days.
These low-profile lids take up 23% less space in shipping containers.
example.egtrans: 这些占地小的盖子在运输容器的时候少占了23%的空间。

example.eg: Putting a phone number in a public profile on a social network site can be dangerous.
